title: Risking Exposure
description: Munich, Germany, 1938. The Nazis are in power and war is on the horizon. Timid Sophie Adler is a member of Hitler Youth and a talented amateur photographer. When she contracts polio, her Youth leader supplies her with film. Photographs she takes of fellow polio patients are turned into propaganda, mocking people with disabilities, people just like her. Sophieâ€™s new disability has changed her status. She has joined the ranks of the outsiders, targets of Nazi scorn and possible persecution. Her only weapon is her camera.This book is an Indie B.R.A.G. Medallion Honoree for Historical Fiction.The story concludes in The Path Divided.
author: Jeanne Moran
